content:
If anyone is interested in applying for the GitHub Accelerator program, I'd be happy to support your application and help you with a BRL-CAD write-up. AI experience required. They're giving 10 people $40k to work on an open source AI project for 10 weeks (full time).

Some potential topics include developing neural rendering for accelerated visualzation, vehicle detection using a CAD-trained neural net, and point-cloud to solid geometry autoencoding.

Details on the program at https://accelerator.github.com
